text:
we're born into this world with a game board in 
front of us across the table playing the opposing

side is the spirit of the society that we're 
born into we're told from a very young age that

in order to win this game we need to succeed in 
what Society expects from us whether this means

getting good grades so that we can get a good 
career making money to buy a house or getting

married to someone desirable and having kids the 
instructions vary depending on which society we're

born into One Thing That Remains the Same however 
is that from a very young age we are told to focus

the majority of our attention on this specific 
game in front of us for over a decade this is

all we are instructed to think about but truth be 
told that this game is not the most important you

see there is another game going on above you a 
game played by Giants on a much larger scale one

that determines the fate of entire nations and 
their people a game that determines your very

survival and also how enjoyable of a life you 
will likely live this is the grand game before

I tell you more about what this means I like 
to give a quick little shout out to of the

sponsors of today's video audible I've been using 
Audible for years now in fact I really don't read

physical books anymore and that's because I 
find listening to audiobooks to be far more

effective using Audible has allowed me to learn 
life-changing things on the go while I'm doing my

grocery shopping commuting somewhere or doing 
my daily chores it's far more convenient than

having to bring a physical book with me wherever 
I go as an audible member you can choose one title

a month to keep from their entire catalog this 
includes almost all of the latest bestsellers

and new releases for all genres including Memoirs 
motivational educational business philosophy and

much more members will also gain full access 
to a growing selection of audible Originals

podcasts and more go to audible.com forward slash 
Improvement pill or text Improvement pill to 500

500 to get access to Audible for 30 days free 
today I recommend listening to the sovereign

individual by James Davidson a book that managed 
to predict social media cryptocurrency and many

more technology trends that have changed our 
world today a book that is extremely relevant to

to the rest of this video now back to the topic 
at hand the grand game is a game that we often

hear whispers about as we go about our lives it's 
a game played by the Giants of the world people

groups and ideas with huge amounts of influence 
and power capable of moving giant chess pieces

around the Giant's board the Giants here are 
playing against each other what's at stake is

more power this is something that's always been 
the case and probably will be for a long time

now why does any of this matter well there are two 
reasons why this game is important two reasons why

you must pay attention reason number one getting 
crushed you and I we're essentially tiny little

ants on this giant chessboard if we don't pay 
attention if we don't look up there's a pretty

high chance that we'll eventually get crushed by 
the giant pieces moving around this might mean

losing your job and your savings due to a shift in 
the economy losing your home because of a natural

disaster or being stuck in a war-torn country with 
no way out some might say that thinking like this

serves no purpose that one should avoid negative 
news and just focus on the things in front one

of us for the sake of our happiness but this is 
something that I strongly disagree with if you

choose to ignore the signs if you don't challenge 
your existing beliefs about the world and look up

you won't be able to move out of the way you won't 
be able to switch up your strategy the Giants are

constantly moving their Pieces Just because it's 
been peaceful on a particular Square does not mean

that nothing will ever happen in fact the only 
thing you can guarantee in life is that things do

happen now I understand that reading the news can 
really screw if one's mood it can lead to anxiety

or depression if this is the case there are two 
things you can do firstly instead of looking at

the horrific details just read the headlines and 
instead of reading the headlines every day just

do it once a month or even once every two months 
there are basically four things to keep track of

what's happening in the economy what's happening 
to Nations nearby what's happening to the supply

chain things like energy and food and what's 
happening with the climate alternatively you

can find people who don't feel anxiety looking 
up and check in with them every once in a while

for a brief summary some sources I refer to are 
people on YouTube like Peter zaihan and the sub

Reddit r slash geopolitics when you realize one 
of the Giants is about to make a move that could

potentially Crush you it's time to switch up 
your strategy and move squares whether this

means thinking about a new career path moving 
your Investments stocking up on supplies or even

actually relocating yourself and your loved ones 
now don't let this bum you out too much because

there is a bright side to all of this you see 
the second reason why we must pay attention

to the Grand game is because we want to figure 
out which giant is winning why well if you can

position yourself on the winning giant side you'll 
be able to reap the benefits of the winner you'll

avoid getting crushed your wealth will multiply 
and your standard of living will definitely be

higher than those on the squares of the losing 
Giants let's take for example a battle that I've

been following closely the battle between the 
decentralized and centralized Giants the world

of crypto nfts and D5 versus the current system 
that we have now centralized Banks paper money

and government these two Giants have been duking 
it out on the battlefield for the past decade

at first it seemed like the centralized Giant 
was starting to win people said things like ah

they'll just ban Bitcoin they would never allow 
it to grow big enough to be a threat but had you

sided with the decentralized giant if you move the 
small fraction of your wealth onto its squares in

something truly decentralized like Bitcoin your 
wealth would have multiplied many times over

now neither side is guaranteed a win as we can see 
crypto is currently not doing well at all but it's

an ongoing battle and no one knows for certain 
who the winner will be but there are definitely

signs that you would have caught if you simply 
looked up and there will be many more signs to

come now don't get me wrong the game in front 
of you is still very important it is something

that you should spend the majority of your time on 
but you should challenge your existing beliefs and

look up every once in a while to avoid getting 
crushed because remember the only thing certain

in life is that the Giants will continue to play 
their game which means things will always change
